ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] kunark level 21
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve noticed these spiders don t have a huge aggro range.  I always go thru this area with Selos a drum and eyes wide open. I m told superior cammo/invis works
ygData.messageBody:
I've noticed these spiders don't have a huge aggro
range. I always go thru this area with Selos a drum
and eyes wide open.

I'm told superior cammo/invis works for most of the
spiders. Sonorous clouding works on most of the
spiders as well. One (don't remember which) sees thru
it.

Tyunes of Rodcrt Nife
Bard of the 21st song


--- Papa Legba <legba@...> wrote:
> Weird, maybe the players hunt the spiders often on
> Veeshan, because I
> don't have a problem with my cleric there either
> (who has no speed up).
> I sometimes almost run into the things and they
> almost never pay
> attention to me...
>
> "Perhaps a Princess..." wrote:
> >
> > I have died twice in Firiona Vie. I have had
> groupmates die a lot
> > more trying to get through there (esp when on
> corpse recovery) It is
> > possible Selo's is fast enough that you don't
> aggro stuff. I have generally
> > gone through as my enchanter, who has no movement
> speed increase :( IF I
> > can get a Spirit of Wolf, though (without bugging
> people too much. I don't
> > want to be one of those the druids are laughing at
> behind their hands)
> > I do, and I don't think I've ever gotten killed
> then.
> >
> > I do know it is generally going through Firiona
> Vie that causes
> > my guildies to declare Kunark a deathtrap and head
> abck to
> > Antonica.
> >
> > Sarah Heacock sarah@...
> > Meara Daring, level 25 Enchanter, Master Jeweler,
> owner Meara's Boutique of
> > Mystiques, Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
> > Faerain Wanderer, level 20 Soldier of Tunare,
> Phoenix, Solusek Ro /
> > Faesong, level 17 HalfElf Bard of Solusek Ro,
> Phoenix, Solusek Ro (Qeynos) /
> > <lvl 6 paladin -- baby BASHer!>
> >
> > >-----Original Message-----
> > >From: Papa Legba [mailto:legba@...]
> > >Sent: Tuesday, May 16, 2000 5:56 PM
> > >To: eqbards@egroups.com
> > >Subject: Re: [eqbards] kunark level 21
> > >
> > >
> > >Do you really have problems with them? I have
> never even had one look
> > >at twice at me, they don;t seem to be very
> aggressive... Especially
> > >with Selo's I never thought of them as a
> threat...
> > >
> > >>
> > >> The hardest part of Kunark is getting through
> Firiona Vie without
> > >> being slaughtered by the spiders.
> > >
> > >--
> > >We now return to the non-stop rock.
> > >
> > >Matt DeBarger
